Patch Set 2:

This is basically a no-op for this repo right?

Patch Set 2:

[john]
> This is basically a no-op for this repo right?

Pretty much a no-op yes. It is getting these eng.git commits:

* 9058562 - TOOLS-2248 move download.joyent.com/pub/build/go/... builds to Manta TOOLS-2247 move sdcnode to manta
* 01f669d - TOOLS-2300 buildimage should set "published_at" in image manifests (2 weeks ago) <Tim Foster>
* 098851f - TOOLS-2298 check-copyright fails for non-master Jenkins builds 
* a0ad64e - TOOLS-2287 bits-upload gets confused when building a gerrit branch 
* 63e056b - TOOLS-2279 sunset 13.3.1 image building support 
* 221cb14 - TOOLS-2264 buildimage should write a sane etc/motd 
* 940d8fb - TRITON-1329 runtests summarization induces spurious exit code 
* ed10150 - TOOLS-604 want tooling to check copyrights (fix bash usage to not exit on first err) 
* 9a72f88 - TOOLS-604 want tooling to check copyrights 
* ca4a08e - TOOLS-2265 example boilerplate should point at modern node & image versions 
* 4e33bf4 - TOOLS-2258 buildimage should drop the zoneroot 'config' dir 
* d25b8fc - TOOLS-2256 eng check target for rust code 
* 3186017 - TOOLS-2178 eng check targets should reference resources in deps/eng/tools 
* 5bca25c - TOOLS-2252 prototypes in eng.git should follow RFD 164 
* 15d50bc - TOOLS-2251 Makefile.go_prebuilt.targ references local copy of download_go instead of eng.git path 
* dcf15a6 - TRITON-1346 triton-origin-minimal-64-19.1.0 image 
* c562c8c - TOOLS-2169 engbld needs to know about 18.4 
* 37cdb9f - TOOLS-2238 bits-upload targets should allow an override 
* 8dccea3 - TOOLS-2227 bits-upload IMAGEFILE regex greedily eats dots (4 months ago) <Tim Foster>
* bcaf067 - TOOLS-2202 buildimage needs a mechanism to audit pkgsrc packages TOOLS-2203 buildimage needs a way to (optionally) upgrade packages 
* 126c0f0 - TOOLS-2101 jsstyle submodules too old for old perls 
* d712bcc - TOOLS-2201 engbld submodule handling results in dirty repositories (5 months ago) <Tim Foster>
* 3fb93c5 - TOOLS-2199 engbld should check for uid == 0 and set $(PFEXEC) accordingly (5 months ago) <Tim Foster>
* fb426aa - TOOLS-2181 buildimage target should bail out early for non-zfs components 
* 3bdc30e - TOOLS-2193 TOP Makefile.defs assignment complicates overriding 
* cc594db - TOOLS-2192 buildimage target fails with non-default BUILDIMAGE_VERSION value 
* 89ac056 - TOOLS-2195 overriding ENGBLD_BITS_DIR is ignored by bits-upload.sh 
* c2e6282 - TOOLS-2191 forcing smartdc_service:true prevents buildimage from building non-services 
* cfd827a - TOOLS-2188 bits-upload.sh should pass --compression=none for uncompressed image files 
* 1840f1f - TOOLS-2177 Fix some broken links in eng.git/index.md 
* 7c472bc - TOOLS-2174 agent-cache 'clone' should use '--' when switching branches


ipxe's build will use eng.git's "bits-upload", which has some changes, so
theoretically it is affected ... but not likely.

Patch Set 2:

Actually the addition of 'make check-copyright' could affect future ipxe.git changes. If so, we can turn off copyright checking for this repo.
Uploaded patch set 3: Commit message was updated.
Change has been successfully merged by Tim Foster

Patch Set 3:

I checked that 'make check' currently succeeds for this component, which included these eng.git changes.
